title: Top 5 Countries by Sales Volume
description: Displays the top 5 countries with the highest total sales volume.
request_sql: SELECT country, SUM(quantity) as total_sales FROM data GROUP BY country ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 5

title: Average Unit Price by Country
description: Displays the average unit price for each country where transactions have occurred.
request_sql: SELECT country, AVG(unitprice) as avg_unitprice FROM data GROUP BY country

title: Top 5 Products by Sales Volume
description: Displays the top 5 products with the highest total sales volume.
request_sql: SELECT stockcode, SUM(quantity) as total_sales FROM data GROUP BY stockcode ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 5
